descriptions.description: A more diverse contributor base attracts a wider pool of potential new contributors to the project.
As contributors skill up, they move out of the New Contributors stock, reducing its level.
Developer turnover directly drains the Core Developer stock by removing experienced members.
The promotion rate increases the Core Developer stock by moving experienced contributors into it.
The promotion rate decreases the Experienced Contributors stock by moving its members into the core group.
The skill-up flow increases the Experienced Contributors stock by moving new contributors into it.
Effective mentorship accelerates skill development by providing direct guidance and tacit knowledge.
Clear documentation and guides accelerate skill acquisition by providing accessible, structured knowledge.
Effective mentorship increases the promotion rate by preparing experienced contributors for core team responsibilities.
More core developers increase the project's capacity for providing mentorship and implicit knowledge transfer.
